PROJECTS TAKEN.Description: Implemented a modified version of the BBRS algorithm(used to find reverse skylines using R-tree) to find reverse k-dominant skylines.
Built a classifier for the MLSP Bird Classification challenge 2013 for detecting bird species by listening to audio clips as part of the project for the Machine Learning course at IITK.
Spam classifier for messages using naïve Bayesian classifier on top of Hadoop framework.

PROJECTS TAKEN.Title of Project: Analysis of performance of multiple processors using m2s
PROJECTS TAKEN.Description: Worked on the analysis of performance of multiple processors using multi2sim under professor Biplab Kumar Sikdar of IIEST. Used the simulator to study the relations between cache size & misss rate, block size & miss rate, replacement policy & miss rate and mapping scheme & miss rate.

PROJECTS TAKEN.Title of Project: Game Development (Space Adventure) using Java applet
PROJECTS TAKEN.Description:
The project was on game development (using Java) where I  implemented the concepts of applets, multithreaded programming, double buffering and event handling while in 3rd semester under professor Biplab Kumar Sikdar of IIEST .
In  the game the user is to control the movements of a ship and shoot down asteroids in space.

HONOR & AWARD.Title: 3rd in India in IIESTHack, a coding contest held at Hackerrank
